nodes.text: Amethyst Shipping & Storage was a phantom company on New Cov, established by Garm Bel Iblis during the Galactic Civil War. It maintained a warehouse in Ilic, where Han Solo first met Bel Iblis' right and left hand, Sena and Irenez respectively. Solo lost sight of Council-Aide Tav Breil'lya when he ducked into this establishment just before the raid on New Cov.
Amethyst is a real world variety of quartz.
